description: Python package for Gaussian process regression in pythondemo_gpr.py explains how to perform basic regression tasks.demo_gpr_robust.py shows how to apply EP for robust Gaussian process regression.gpr.py Basic gp regression packagegpr_ep.py GP regression with EP likelihood modelscovar covariance functions

info.Author:: Oliver Stegle, Max Zwiessele, Nicolo Fusi
